mapper.select: SELECT FACILITIES_NO , FACILITIES_NAME , UNIT_PRICE , LOCATION , OPERATION_TIME , DAY_OFF , CONTACT , AMENITY , IMAGE , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , DEL_YN FROM FACILITIES

SELECT FACILITIES_NO , FACILITIES_NAME , UNIT_PRICE , LOCATION , OPERATION_TIME , DAY_OFF , CONTACT , AMENITY , IMAGE , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , DEL_YN FROM FACILITIES WHERE FACILITIES_NO = #{facilitiesNo}
SELECT FACILITIES_NO , FACILITIES_NAME , IMAGE FROM FACILITIES WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT FACILITIES_NO , FACILITIES_NAME , UNIT_PRICE , LOCATION , OPERATION_TIME , DAY_OFF , CONTACT , AMENITY , IMAGE FROM FACILITIES WHERE FACILITIES_NO = #{facilitiesNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT F.FACILITIES_NO , FACILITIES_NAME , APPLICATION_NO , H.MEMBER_NO , APPLICATION_DATE , USE_DATE , PRICE , CANCEL_DATE , NAME FROM FACILITIES F JOIN FACILITIES_HISTORY H ON F.FACILITIES_NO = H.FACILITIES_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = H.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY APPLICATION_DATE DESC

SELECT F.FACILITIES_NO , FACILITIES_NAME , APPLICATION_NO , M.MEMBER_NO , APPLICATION_DATE , USE_DATE , PRICE , CANCEL_DATE , NAME FROM FACILITIES F JOIN FACILITIES_HISTORY H ON F.FACILITIES_NO = H.FACILITIES_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = H.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND USE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY USE_DATE DESC
